title: Back in BUSINESS
body_text:
We here at dodgeball.livejournal.com would like to send our sincere apologies to all fans of EastCoastDodgeball for the lack of updates and news over the past couple of weeks. But fear not! "The Writer" is 'Back in Business', ready and willing to continue this magnificent journey!
________________________________________
_____________________
DODGEBALL 132 Results
Battle Royal Series
has begun!
The dreaded Dodgeball
Battle Royal
, where it was every man and woman for themselves. Up for grabs was full creative control over a single event - the formation of teams, the gametype - an endless list of possibilities to formulate the show as one sees fit. And the subtitle
Back in Business
couldn't have been more appropriate for the legendary loud-mouth
Diana DiBuccio
.
Battle Royal Contestants
: Bobby Vetrano, Chris Everett,
Diana DiBuccio
, Grant Cornero, John Tronolone, Justin Wolf, Kevin Adams, Mike Edwards
(Runner-up)
, Ryan Letsche, Travis Mills.
The Rules
:
Prison Ball
Rules.
The Match
: Team THREE defeated Team FOUR, 9 to 2.
Moments & Stars
: Travis Mills receiving numerous face and headshots; Diana DiBuccio sitting in a camping chair while imprisoned; Grant Cornero's imprisoned teammates not wanting to catch his rocket-fast bulletball throws
Attendance
: 19 competitors, comprised of 15 men and 4 women.
Coming Up Next
: The continuation of April 2008's
Battle Royal Series
. Again, the winner of next week's free-for-all will earn booking power and bragging rights.
________________________________________
_____________________
DODGEBALL 131 Exclusive!
The last piece of business concerns the March 22 confrontation pitting female titan Valerie Winston against the self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone. Aside from the nail-biting finish, this match is particular notable for its special stipulation .. the dreaded "CREAMation Rules"! Ten ultra-violent rounds were arduously contested for and in the end, only one participant remained clean. Take a look at this never-before-released video from DODGEBALL 131!
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
CREAMation Rules
in effect with special ingredient, orange gelatin.
The Match
: Tronolone defeated Winston, 6 to 4.
Moments & Stars
: John Tronolone eliminating most of his opposition in Game 2; Bobby Vetrano's game-winning suicide dive on Ryan Letsche, followed by Letsche's trash can-kicking frenzy
Attendance
: 20 competitors, comprised of 14 men and 6 women.
Captain's Statistics
: Tronolone 4-8-0 / Winston 3-5-1. First two competitors to partake in two
CREAMation
bouts.
Online Exclusive
: DODGEBALL 131 was originally to feature a special "2 vs. 3" Handicap Match also including Travis Mills, Kristen Driscoll, and Sascha Basista.
body_html:
We here at dodgeball.livejournal.com would like to send our sincere apologies to all fans of EastCoastDodgeball for the lack of updates and news over the past couple of weeks. But fear not! "The Writer" is 'Back in Business', ready and willing to continue this magnificent journey!
_____________________________________________________________

DODGEBALL 132 Results
Battle Royal Series has begun!
The dreaded Dodgeball Battle Royal, where it was every man and woman for themselves. Up for grabs was full creative control over a single event - the formation of teams, the gametype - an endless list of possibilities to formulate the show as one sees fit. And the subtitle Back in Business couldn't have been more appropriate for the legendary loud-mouth Diana DiBuccio.

Battle Royal Contestants: Bobby Vetrano, Chris Everett, Diana DiBuccio, Grant Cornero, John Tronolone, Justin Wolf, Kevin Adams, Mike Edwards (Runner-up), Ryan Letsche, Travis Mills.

The Rules: Prison Ball Rules.
The Match: Team THREE defeated Team FOUR, 9 to 2.
Moments & Stars: Travis Mills receiving numerous face and headshots; Diana DiBuccio sitting in a camping chair while imprisoned; Grant Cornero's imprisoned teammates not wanting to catch his rocket-fast bulletball throws
Attendance: 19 competitors, comprised of 15 men and 4 women.

Coming Up Next: The continuation of April 2008's Battle Royal Series. Again, the winner of next week's free-for-all will earn booking power and bragging rights.
_____________________________________________________________

DODGEBALL 131 Exclusive!

The last piece of business concerns the March 22 confrontation pitting female titan Valerie Winston against the self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone. Aside from the nail-biting finish, this match is particular notable for its special stipulation .. the dreaded "CREAMation Rules"! Ten ultra-violent rounds were arduously contested for and in the end, only one participant remained clean. Take a look at this never-before-released video from DODGEBALL 131!

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up. CREAMation Rules in effect with special ingredient, orange gelatin.
The Match: Tronolone defeated Winston, 6 to 4.
Moments & Stars: John Tronolone eliminating most of his opposition in Game 2; Bobby Vetrano's game-winning suicide dive on Ryan Letsche, followed by Letsche's trash can-kicking frenzy
Attendance: 20 competitors, comprised of 14 men and 6 women.
Captain's Statistics: Tronolone 4-8-0 / Winston 3-5-1. First two competitors to partake in two CREAMation bouts.
Online Exclusive: DODGEBALL 131 was originally to feature a special "2 vs. 3" Handicap Match also including Travis Mills, Kristen Driscoll, and Sascha Basista.
